trans-unit.source: Represents a plug-in that can be added to a control's <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.StylusPlugIns*> property.
The StylusPlugIn allows you to manipulate <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint> objects on separate threads.
Separate threads are used so that the ink still renders as the tablet pen inputs data even if the application is doing something else.
To intercept stylus points from the hardware, create a class that inherits from the StylusPlugIn class.
The StylusPlugIn class has the following methods that you can override to manipulate <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint> objects on a thread in the pen thread pool.

- <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn.OnStylusDown%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn.OnStylusUp%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn.OnStylusMove%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn.OnStylusEnter%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn.OnStylusLeave%2A> The pen's input is routed to an element's StylusPlugIn on the pen thread.
Since accurate hit-testing cannot be performed on the pen thread, some elements might occasionally receive stylus input intended for other elements.

If you need to make sure the input was routed correctly before performing an operation, subscribe to and perform the operation in the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn.OnStylusDownProcessed%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn.OnStylusMoveProcessed%2A>, or <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn.OnStylusUpProcessed%2A> method.
These methods are invoked by the main application thread after accurate hit-testing has been performed.
To subscribe to these methods, call the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.RawStylusInput.NotifyWhenProcessed%2A> method in the method that occurs on the pen thread.

For example, if you call <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.RawStylusInput.NotifyWhenProcessed%2A> in <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn.OnStylusMove%2A>, the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn.OnStylusMoveProcessed%2A> occurs.
> [!NOTE] > If you use a StylusPlugIn inside a control, you should test the plug-in and control extensively to make sure they do not throw any unintended exceptions.
## XAML Text Usage This class is not typically used in XAML.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn"></xref> class.
Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> to which the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn"></xref> is attached.
The <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> to which the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn"></xref> is attached.
Gets the cached bounds of the element.
The <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn> caches the bounds of its element to perform hit testing.
The cached bounds of the element.
Gets or sets whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn"></xref> is active.
## XAML Text Usage This property is not typically used in XAML.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn"></xref> is active; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
Gets whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn"></xref> is able to accept input.

The following conditions must be met for the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn> to accept input: - The <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn> is a member of a <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugInCollection>.
- The <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn.Element%2A> of the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn> is visible and enabled.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn"></xref> is able to accept input; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Occurs when the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn"></xref> is added to an element.
Occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn.Enabled*> property changes.
Occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn.IsActiveForInput*> property changes.
Use the OnIsActiveForInputChanged method to allocate and clean up resources used by the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn>.
Occurs when the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn"></xref> is removed from an element.
Occurs on a thread in the pen thread pool when the tablet pen touches the digitizer.
This method occurs on a pen thread, so minimize work in this method to avoid impacting performance.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.RawStylusInput"></xref> that contains information about input from the pen.
Occurs on the application UI (user interface) thread when the tablet pen touches the digitizer.
To subscribe to this method, call <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.RawStylusInput.NotifyWhenProcessed%2A> in the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn.OnStylusDown%2A> method.
The object that the application passed to the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.RawStylusInput.NotifyWhenProcessed%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the pen's input was correctly routed to the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Occurs on a pen thread when the cursor enters the bounds of an element.
This method occurs on a pen thread, so minimize work in this method to avoid impacting performance.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.RawStylusInput"></xref> that contains information about input from the pen.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the pen actually entered the bounds of the element; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Occurs on a pen thread when the cursor leaves the bounds of an element.
This method occurs on a pen thread, so minimize work in this method to avoid impacting performance.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.RawStylusInput"></xref> that contains information about input from the pen.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the pen actually left the bounds of the element; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Occurs on a pen thread when the tablet pen moves on the digitizer.
This method occurs on a pen thread, so minimize work in this method to avoid impacting performance.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.RawStylusInput"></xref> that contains information about input from the pen.
Occurs on the application UI (user interface) thread when the tablet pen moves on the digitizer.
To subscribe to this method, call <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.RawStylusInput.NotifyWhenProcessed%2A> in the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn.OnStylusMove%2A> method
The object that the application passed to the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.RawStylusInput.NotifyWhenProcessed%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the pen's input was correctly routed to the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Occurs on a pen thread when the user lifts the tablet pen from the digitizer.
This method occurs on a pen thread, so minimize work in this method to avoid impacting performance.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.RawStylusInput"></xref> that contains information about input from the pen.
Occurs on the application UI (user interface) thread when the user lifts the tablet pen from the digitizer.
To subscribe to this method, call <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.RawStylusInput.NotifyWhenProcessed%2A> in the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn.OnStylusUp%2A> method
The object that the application passed to the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.RawStylusInput.NotifyWhenProcessed%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the pen's input was correctly routed to the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
